Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl

Class GL13

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.GL10C
overrungl.opengl.GL11C
overrungl.opengl.GL12C
overrungl.opengl.GL13C
overrungl.opengl.GL13
public final class GL13 extends GL13C
GL13 relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GL13 refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GL13 when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The OpenGL 1.3 functions.

These extensions are promoted in this version:

  • GL_ARB_transpose_matrix
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
